qualifier: Fragment `codetoanalyze.java.checkers.FragmentRetainsViewExample` does not nullify View field `mCustomView` (type `codetoanalyze.java.checkers.FragmentRetainsViewExample$CustomView`) in `onDestroyView`. If this Fragment is placed on the back stack, a reference to this (probably dead) View will be retained. In general, it is a good idea to initialize View's in `onCreateView`, then nullify them in `onDestroyView`.
